name: roi2nix
label: ROI to NIfTI
description: This gear converts ROIs created in Flywheel's OHIF viewer to NIfTI files.
author: Flywheel

binary_masks.description: Outputs single ROI files with binary masks instead of bitmask value.

combine_output.description: Output ROIs into one combined file. Values are bitmasked.

slicer_color_table.description: Outputs the 3D Slicer Color Table (.ctbl) for all ROIs with Labels.
